meanings.definition: The act of lobating or lobation.
meanings.sent1: The lobations of the chef's knife were precise and skillful.
meanings.sent2: The lobations of the dancer's feet were graceful and coordinated.
meanings.sent3: The lobations of the cat trying to catch a laser pointer were hilarious to watch.
meanings.sent4: The lobations of the spider weaving its web were intricate and beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The lobations of the basketball player shooting hoops were impressive and accurate.

meanings.definition: The state of being lobate or lobated.
meanings.sent1: The lobations of the landscape created a unique and interesting terrain.
meanings.sent2: The lobations of the clouds in the sky added depth to the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The lobations of the jello on the plate made it look like a wobbly mountain.
meanings.sent4: The lobations of the puzzle pieces fitting together perfectly was satisfying to see.
meanings.sent5: The lobations of the waves crashing against the shore were calming and rhythmic.
